SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

Class LevelLoader

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.controller.LevelLoader
public class LevelLoader extends Object
Loads and initialises game levels and their components.

The LevelLoader class is in charge of setting up the game levels, which include loading backgrounds, platforms, endpoints, and other elements.

It uses the LevelModel to retrieve level data and the MoneyController to manage the game's money items.

    • loadLevel

      public void loadLevel(String[] levelData)
      Loads the specified level data and initialises the level entities.

      The loadLevel method loads the level data from the supplied array and adds all level entities, such as platforms, endpoints, money items, eagle and snakes to the game screen.

      Parameters:
      levelData - the data of the level to load

    • addAllEntitiesToView

      private void addAllEntitiesToView()
      Adds all the level entities to the game view.

    • addEntitiesToView

      Adds the specified entities to the game view.
      Parameters:
      entities - the list of entities to add

    • getEndpoints

      public List<javafx.scene.Node> getEndpoints()
      Returns the list of level endpoints.

      The getEndpoints method returns the list of endpoints at the current level. Endpoints are used to signify the level's goal or finish line.

      Returns:
      The list of level endpoints

    • getSnakes

      public List<Snake> getSnakes()
      Returns the list of snakes in the level.

      The getSnakes method returns the list of snake opponents at the current level.

      Returns:
      The list of snakes
